cause.description:
Leukemia is a malignant progressive disease in which the bone marrow and other blood-forming organs produce increased numbers of immature or abnormal leukocytes. These suppress the production of normal blood cells, leading to anemia and other symptons.
We must try to stop this, my grandfather almost died from this horrible disease and many others have done the same. We need to fight to stop leukemia, if we don't it will continue to end most of our lives if we get diagnosed.
1. I am ready to fight to end this disease.
2. To stop it we will need everone to help.
cause.name: Leukemia
